name: A long bright blue skirt
data: It increases the users intelligence poorly.
It has excellent armour class for its type (feeble in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration a bit.
It decreases the users hitpoint regeneration somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'create illusion'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'mastery of illusions'.
